MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Bridge of Aldouran and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:36am due to reports of a grounded overhead electricity line near Kathleen Cottage and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:34pm on Sunday, 13 December 2020
